channel.title: backlinks on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in backlinks on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How to find the backlinks to your site which are indexed by Google?
item.description: I was trying to find backlinks for my site on google search. The best way to do this was to do a search, using the following parameters: [your Keywords or your Sitename] -site:yoursitename.com Basically this will located all the words which match the search terms, excluding your own site -> which are actually the backlinks to your site. Publish Date: 2014-10-19
